Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We are given an event log with three cases (C001, C002, C003). We notice that the same activity names appear multiple times within the same case and across cases. The activities that are repeated and need disambiguation are: - Verify Documents: appears multiple times in C001, C002, and C003 with different contexts. - Call Customer: appears twice in C002 and once in C003 and once in C001, but with different purposes. - Adjust Account: appears in C002 and C003, but note that in C003 it is preceded by a different context.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Let's break down by activity and case: Activity: Verify Documents - In C001: First occurrence: Initial verification of identity documents (by BackOfficeAgent). Second occurrence: Re-check after customer submitted additional documents (by BackOfficeAgent). - In C002: First occurrence: Initial verification (by BackOfficeAgent). We don't have a second occurrence of Verify Documents in C002? Actually, we have two in C001 and C003, but only one in C002. Correction: In C002, there is only one Verify Documents. - In C003: First occurrence: Physical verification of ID by BranchOfficer. Second occurrence: Re-verify after account adjustment (by BranchOfficer).

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Actually, the task is to rename the activities so that the names reflect the context. We can do: For Verify Documents: - If it's the first occurrence in a case: Initial Document Verification - If it's the second occurrence: * In C001: the context is about having received additional documents -> Document Reverification (Additional Docs Received) * In C003: the context is after an account adjustment -> Document Reverification (Post-Account Adjustment)

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Activity: Call Customer - In C001: Verification incomplete, agent calls to request missing docs. -> Purpose: Request missing documents. - In C002: First call: Outbound call to clarify account discrepancy. Second call: Follow-up call to confirm adjustments made. - In C003: Customer stepped out. Officer calls to have them return. -> Purpose: Recall customer.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: However, to keep it concise and clear, we can do: C001: Call Customer (Missing Docs) C002: First: Call Customer (Clarify Discrepancy) Second: Call Customer (Confirm Adjustment) C003: Call Customer (Recall)

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Activity: Adjust Account This appears in C002 and C003. ... But wait: the task says activity names appear multiple times within a single case - so we are only concerned with multiple occurrences in the same case. Therefore, we do not need to change Adjust Account because it only appears once per case. However, we note that the same activity name in different cases has different contexts. But the problem does not require us to change the name across cases. We are only to disambiguate within the same case.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: So we will change: - In C001: two Verify Documents -> we change the second one to reflect the context (reverification after additional documents) - In C002: two Call Customer -> change the first to Call for Clarification and the second to Call for Confirmation, and also change the activity names? Actually, we are to rename the activity name for each occurrence to reflect the context. - In C003: two Verify Documents -> change the second one to reflect the context (reverification after account adjustment).

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: We'll follow the rule: only change the activities that are repeated within the same case. So: - In C001: First Verify Documents: we change to Initial Document Verification -> because without changing it, the two would both be Verify Documents and we need to disambiguate. Second Verify Documents: change to Document Reverification (Additional Docs) - In C002: First Call Customer: change to Call for Clarification Second Call Customer: change to Call for Confirmation - In C003: First Verify Documents: change to Initial Document Verification Second Verify Documents: change to Document Reverification (After Adjustment) We leave the other occurrences of these activities (if they appear only once) unchanged.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Note: The Call Customer in C001 and C003 remain unchanged because they occur only once in their respective cases and do not require disambiguation within the case. Similarly, the Verify Documents in C002 remains unchanged because it occurs only once in that case.
